title: Mad Max: beyond thunderdome
creator_credit: George Ogilvie, George Miller, Byron Kennedy and Kennedy Miller Productions
brief_description: Mad Max continues as the hero who stands alone against barbarians of a post-nuclear age. The action is set in Bartertown, where Max arrives in search of some stolen property and has to fight a duel in the Thunderdome arena. Mel Gibson is joined by Tina Turner in the third Mad Max film. Cast also includes Helen Buday, Frank Thring, Bruce Spence, Robert Grubb, Angry Anderson.
